清.definition: (of water etc) clear; clean; quiet; still; pure; uncorrupted; clear; distinct; to clear; to settle (accounts)

清一色.definition: (mahjong) flush; a complete hand where all tiles are of the same suit; (fig.) uniformly; each and every one

清代通史.definition: General History of the Qing dynasty, compiled under Xiao Yishan 蕭一山|萧一山[Xiao1 Yi1 shan1]

清倉.definition: to take an inventory of stock; to clear out one's stock

清倉查庫.definition: to make an inventory of warehouses

清償.definition: to repay a debt in full; to redeem; to clear

清原.definition: Qingyuan county in Fushun 撫順|抚顺, Liaoning

清原滿族自治縣.pinyin: Qing1 yuan2 Man3 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

清原縣.definition: Qingyuan county in Fushun 撫順|抚顺, Liaoning

清史列傳.definition: Biographic History of Qing Dynasty by a succession of authors, published 1928 and revised 1987, with biographies of 2,900 notable Qing commoner citizens, 80 scrolls

清史稿.definition: Draft History of the Qing Dynasty, sometimes listed as number 25 or 26 of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Zhao Erxun 趙爾巽|赵尔巽[Zhao4 Er3 xun4] in 1927 during the Northern Warlords period, 536 scrolls

清史館.definition: office set up in 1914 to compile official history of the Qing dynasty

清唱.definition: to sing opera arias without staging, costume or makeup; to sing a cappella

清嗓.definition: to clear one's throat; to hawk

清城.definition: Qingcheng district of Qingyuan city 清遠市|清远市[Qing1 yuan3 shi4], Guangdong

清城區.definition: Qingcheng district of Qingyuan city 清遠市|清远市[Qing1 yuan3 shi4], Guangdong

清太宗.definition: posthumous title of Hong Taiji 皇太極|皇太极[Huang2 Tai4 ji2] (1592-1643), eighth son of Nurhaci 努爾哈赤|努尔哈赤[Nu3 er3 ha1 chi4], reigned 1626-1636 as Second Khan of Later Jin dynasty 後金|后金[Hou4 Jin1], then founded the Qing dynasty 大清[Da4 Qing1] and reigned 1636-1643 as Emperor

清太祖.definition: posthumous title of Nurhaci 努爾哈赤|努尔哈赤[Nu3 er3 ha1 chi4] (1559-1626), founder and first Khan of the Manchu Later Jin dynasty 後金|后金[Hou4 Jin1] (from 1616)

清官難斷家務事.pinyin: qing1 guan1 nan2 duan4 jia1 wu4 shi4
清官難斷家務事.definition: even an honest and upright official will have difficulty resolving a family dispute (proverb)

清宛縣.definition: Qingwan county in Baoding prefecture, Hebei

清寒.definition: poor; underprivileged; (of weather) crisp and clear

清屏.definition: (computing) to clear (all items on the display screen)

清州.definition: Cheongju, capital of North Chungcheong Province, South Korea 忠清北道[Zhong1 qing1 bei3 dao4]

清州市.definition: Cheongju, capital of North Chungcheong Province, South Korea 忠清北道[Zhong1 qing1 bei3 dao4]

清幽.definition: (of a location) quiet and secluded; beautiful and secluded

清廷.definition: the Qing court (as government of China)

清徐.definition: Qingxu county in Taiyuan 太原[Tai4 yuan2], Shanxi

清徐縣.definition: Qingxu county in Taiyuan 太原[Tai4 yuan2], Shanxi

清恬.definition: pure and quiet (of life); tranquil and comfortable

清拆戶.definition: demolition of homes; to destroy homes (for new building projects)

清掃.definition: to tidy up; to mop up; a sweep (against crime)

清新自然.definition: as fresh and clean as nature (idiom)

清早.definition: first thing in the morning; at daybreak

清明.definition: clear and bright; sober and calm; (of a government or administration) well ordered

清明節.definition: Qingming or Pure Brightness Festival or Tomb Sweeping Day, celebration for the dead (in early April)

清朗.definition: clear and bright; unclouded; clear and sonorous (voice); clear and lively (narrative)

清末.definition: the final years of the Qing dynasty 清朝[Qing1 chao2]; late Qing

清末民初.definition: the late Qing and early Republic, i.e. China around 1911

清查.definition: to investigate thoroughly; to carefully inspect; to verify; to ferret out (undesirable elements)

清楚.definition: clear; distinct; to understand thoroughly; to be clear about

清水.definition: fresh water; drinking water; clear water

清水寺.definition: Kiyomizu temple in east Kyōto 京都, Japan

清水河.definition: Qingshuihe county in Hohhot 呼和浩特[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4], Inner Mongolia

清水河縣.definition: Qingshuihe county in Hohhot 呼和浩特[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4], Inner Mongolia

清水縣.definition: Qingshui county in Tianshui 天水[Tian1 shui3], Gansu

清河.definition: Qinghe county in Xingtai 邢台[Xing2 tai2], Hebei; Qinghe district of Tieling city 鐵嶺市|铁岭市[Tie3 ling3 shi4], Liaoning

清河區.definition: Qinghe district of Tieling city 鐵嶺市|铁岭市[Tie3 ling3 shi4], Liaoning; Qinghe district of Huai'an city 淮安市[Huai2 an1 shi4], Jiangsu

清河縣.definition: Qinghe county in Xingtai 邢台[Xing2 tai2], Hebei

清河門.definition: Qinghemen district of Fuxin city 阜新市, Liaoning

清河門區.definition: Qinghemen district of Fuxin city 阜新市, Liaoning

清洗.definition: to wash; to rinse; to clean; (fig.) to purge; to get rid of (corrupt individuals etc)

清津市.definition: Chongjin, capital of North Hamgyeong province 咸鏡北道|咸镜北道[Xian2 jing4 bei3 dao4], North Korea

清流.definition: clean flowing water; (fig.) (literary) honorable person, untainted by association with disreputable influences; scholars who (in former times) kept themselves aloof from the corrupting influence of those in power

清流縣.definition: Qingliu, a county in Sanming City 三明市[San1ming2 Shi4], Fujian

清淡.definition: light (of food, not greasy or strongly flavored); insipid; slack (sales)

清淨.definition: peaceful; quiet; tranquil; purified of defiling illusion (Buddhism)

清滌.definition: to rinse; to wash; to clean; to purge; to comb out

清漿.definition: unsweetened soy milk; plain soy milk

清澈見底.definition: water so clear you can see the bottom

清澈透底.definition: (of a body of water) clear enough to see the bottom; limpid

清澗.definition: Qingjian County in Yulin 榆林[Yu2 lin2], Shaanxi

清澗縣.definition: Qingjian County in Yulin 榆林[Yu2 lin2], Shaanxi

清熱.definition: to alleviate fever (medicine); to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)

清玩.definition: a refined and elegant object for enjoyment; curio

清理.definition: to clear up; to tidy up; to dispose of

清甜.definition: (of flavor, voice etc) clear and sweet

清真.definition: Islamic; Muslim; halal (of food); clean; pure

清福.definition: carefree and comfortable life (esp. in retirement)

清算.definition: to settle accounts; to clear accounts; to liquidate; to expose and criticize

清紅幫.definition: traditional secret society, Chinese equivalent of Freemasons

清脆.definition: sharp and clear; crisp; melodious; ringing; tinkling; silvery (of sound); fragile; frail; also written 輕脆|轻脆

清苦.definition: destitute but honest; poor and simple; spartan; austere

清華.definition: abbr. for 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 Da4 xue2]

清華大學.definition: Tsinghua University, Beijing; National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan

清補涼.definition: ching bo leung, an icy, sweet dessert soup

清豐.definition: Qingfeng county in Puyang 濮陽|濮阳[Pu2 yang2], Henan

清豐縣.definition: Qingfeng county in Puyang 濮陽|濮阳[Pu2 yang2], Henan

清道.definition: to clean the street; to clear the road (i.e. get rid of people for passage of royalty or VIP)

清遠.definition: see 清遠市|清远市[Qing1yuan3 Shi4]

清遠市.definition: Qingyuan, prefecture-level city in Guangdong Province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3dong1 Sheng3]

清酌.definition: wine offered to gods in worship

清鎮.definition: Qingzhen, county-level city in Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2], Guizhou

清鎮市.definition: Qingzhen, county-level city in Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2], Guizhou

清除.definition: to clear away; to eliminate; to get rid of

清零.definition: to restore sth to its initial state; to reset (an odometer etc); to empty (a bank account); to eradicate (a disease); (computing) to clear (memory); to zero (a hard drive)

清風.definition: cool breeze; fig. pure and honest

清風明月.definition: lit. cool breeze and bright moon (idiom); fig. peaceful and clear night; (allusively) living a solitary and quiet life

清高.definition: noble and virtuous; aloof from politics and material pursuits

清麗.definition: (of writing, scenery, a woman etc) graceful; elegant; charming; beautiful

清點帳目.definition: to check the accounts; to take stock

清黨.definition: to purge a political party of undesirable elements
